column1: Ventricular Rate Control in Atrial Fibrillation
column2: Chris3111, 75 or over Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I was hospitalized with digitalis poisoning and a few days later I was informed by my pharmacy that digitek had been recalled because it could be twice the dosage strength indicated.  I came close to dying and am still recovering from the effects after almost a month and a half.  Therapy has helped me very much. I am really mad that I had to suffer like this because of a possible manufacturer's error.

column1: A Type of Fast Heartbeat - Paroxysmal Atrial Tachycardia
column2: Joyce, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I have been on digitex for three years for a fast and irrregular heart beat plus heart failure. I am unable to walk from my den to my kitchen without my heart beating up to 125 beats per minute and am so weak I have to sit down to rest. I don't know if this has been caused by this medicine or some other medication I am taking. I am seeing my Doctor tomorrow about this condition since I feel digitex could have had an adverse effect on my condition.Joyce
